name: Test Unique Product Names
sql: INSERT INTO Products (name, price, stock_quantity) VALUES ('Widget', 19.99, 10); INSERT INTO Products (name, price, stock_quantity) VALUES ('Widget', 19.99, 5);
rationale: Attempting to insert a duplicate product should throw an error due to UNIQUE constraint.

name: Test Inserting Unique Product with Updated Quantity
sql: INSERT INTO Products (name, price, stock_quantity) VALUES ('Gadget', 29.99, 4); INSERT INTO Products (name, price, stock_quantity) VALUES ('Gadget', 29.99, 6);
rationale: A test case to verify that when adding a duplicate product, the quantity is increased instead of creating a new entry.
